* Handles inputs typed in by users. Parses the commands and inputs.

* @throws NotFoundException For find function. If there are no Tasks found

public static final String EMPTY_INPUT = "You need to include more details about your item!";

return String.format("[%s][%c] %s (from: %s to: %s)", TYPE_REPRESENTATION, mark, description, from, to);
